config.siddhiApp: @App:name("ESBConfigEntry") @store(type = 'rdbms', datasource = 'EI_ANALYTICS') define table testSort (meta_tenantId int, hashcode int, entryName string, configData string, timestamp int);

queryData.query: from {{configEntryTable}} on {{componentId}} == entryName AND  {{meta_tenantId}} == meta_tenantId select meta_tenantId, hashcode, entryName, configData, timestamp having timestamp > {{timeFrom}} AND timestamp < {{timeTo}} order by timestamp desc limit 1
